title: An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth. Do you agree or disagree? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s a quote from the Bible. If you ask for “an eye for an eye” you want retribution for a wrong but the payment must be in exactly the same form as the original wrong. So if someone stole your pen, you get their pen; if they kicked you in the leg, you get to kick them in the leg. If they raped your wife ….. well, this is why we have courts and prisons and don’t just say “an eye for an eye”.

Anyone who is going to be the first one to attack is not going to agree to that and also this the flaw of our system the lack of credible deterence…….2 eyes for and eye that creates deterence…..An reprimand for an eye and a slap for a tooth has led our country where it is. The focus should be a evolving effecient effective judiciary and deterrent laws……
It simply means that the punishment should fit the crime
